form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Form G-180, Alien Employment Certification for Beneficiary Alien

full_text: 14. MANJU KHANNA M July 5, 1943 India 413/1 G Block, Alipore, Calcutta, 15. "X" THE APPROPRIATE BOX BELOW AND FURNISH THE INFORMATION REQUIRED FOR THE BOX MARKED. India Alien will apply for a visa abroad at the American Consulate in (City in foreign country) (Foreign country) Alien is in the United States and will apply for adjustment of status to that of a lawful permanent resident in the office of the Immigration and Naturalization Service at Boston Massachusetts If the application for adjustment of status is denied (City) (State) the alien will apply for a visa abroad at the American Consulate in New Delhi; India (City in foreign country) (Foreign country) PART 11-INFORMATION CONCERNING PETITIONING EMPLOYER AND POSITION 16. NAME OF PETITIONER (Full name of organization; if petitioner is an individual give full name with last in capital letters) AUG 17. ADDRESS (Number and street) (Town or city) (State) (ZIP code) 18. NET ANNUAL INCOME 19. WILL BENEFICIARY BE EMPLOYED AT THE ABOVE ADDRESS? YES NO. IF "NO", GIVE ADDRESS WHERE HE WILL WORK. 20. DO YOU DESIRE AND INTEND TO EMPLOY THE BENEFICIARY YES NO. 21. HAVE YOU EVER FILED A VISA PETITION FOR AN ALIEN BASED ON HIS PROFESSION OR OCCUPATION? YES NO. IF "YES," HOW MANY SUCH PETITIONS HAVE YOU FILED? 22. ARE SEPARATE PETITIONS BEING SUBMITTED AT THIS TIME FOR OTHER ALIENS? YES NO. IF "YES," GIVE NAME OF EACH ALIEN. 23. IS THIS PETITION BASED ON AN UNEXPIRED CERTIFICATION OF THE DEPARTMENT OF LABOR FOR A SPECIFIED NUMBER OF ALIENS WHO WILL PERFORM IDENTICAL SERVICES? YES NO. It "Yes," give file number of petition to which certification is attached, or attach certification. 24. THE FOLLOWING DOCUMENTS ARE SUBMITTED AS A PART OF THIS PETITION AND ARE MADE A PART THEREOF. FILL IN ITEMS 25 THROUGH 34 ONLY IF PART B OF FORM ES-575 IS NOT REQUIRED TO BE ATTACHED. ALSO, ITEMS 25 THROUGH 34 NEED NOT BE FILLED IN IF YOU ANSWERED "YES" TO ITEM 23. 25. OCCUPATIONAL TITLE OF POSITION BENEFI- 26. TOTAL HOURS BENEFICIARY WILL WORK PER WEEK 27. RATE OF PAY CIARY WILL OCCUPY 28. IS THE EMPLOYMENT SEASONAL? YES NO. 29. IS THE EMPLOYMENT TEMPORARY YES NO. 30. AVERAGE NUMBER OF EMPLOYEES AT ESTABLISHMENT WHERE BENE- 31. NUMBER OF EMPLOYEES BENEFICIARY WILL SUPERVISE. FICIARY WILL WORK. 32. DESCRIBE FULLY THE JOB TO BE PERFORMED, INCLUDING DUTIES, WORKING CONDITIONS AND EQUIPMENT OPERATED. 33. STATE IN DETAIL THE MINIMUM EDUCATION, TRAINING AND EXPERIENCE REQUIRED FOR PROFICIENCY IN JOB. (Specify degrees and major fields of study required. Specify apprenticeship, trade school or other training required.) 34. DESCRIBE SKILLS, KNOWLEDGES AND ABILITIES REQUIRED FOR PROFICIENCY IN JOB. Specify any other special requirements, list licenses and physical requirements. (Page 2)
